item.title: Tips for Devrel in PyData
item.description: My full-time job at Coiled is to support the Dask community. This involves answering user question, reviewing contributor code, and maintenance activities like fixing bugs and updating the documentation. I have a few systems that make my life as a DevRel professional in the open source PyData space easier. These are things my friends and colleagues have shared with me graciously, and Iâ€™m sharing some of them here so more people can benefit from them.

item.title: Data Visualization Introduction
item.description: Preface # I started planning this series to share my data visualization lecture notes. But, over the past week, it has turned into something much bigger. As I learn more about data visualization, I realized there’s more I want to share. This is not intended as a tutorial or a comprehensive guide. It is just me sharing some notes and thoughts and hoping you find it useful. What is Data Visualization?
